v8:item.v8:content: Settings in cluster to set on enable header page
Settings in cluster to set on enable header information
The following permissions will be supplied for the current infobase on enabling security profile usage in 1C:Enterprise server cluster:
Changes in cluster required header page

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers.
Make changes to the permissions in the security profile to continue:
Settings in cluster to set on recovery header page
Settings in cluster to set on enable header information
The following permissions will be supplied for the current infobase on restoring security profiles in 1C:Enterprise server cluster:
Obsolete permission cancellation required in cluster header page

The security profiles limiting access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers. Update the security profiles in the server cluster as external resource access settings were changed in the app:
Cannot set up permissions in the security profile:
In case of the version error of the "comcntr" component, it must be registered (session restart required).
To set up permissions in the security profile, specify the connection settings for the server cluster where the infobase is deployed:
Parameters for connecting to cluster through protocols pages
Infobase administrator who runs the configuration
Once the security profile settings in the server cluster are changed, the app will restart automatically.

Operation is not supported in web client details

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers.
To continue, make the following changes to the settings of security profiles in the server cluster:

The web client doesn't support changing security profiles in the server cluster.
Open the app in the thin client and try again.
Operation not supported in web client commands
Allow or deny accessing external resources
